whatIsTrainsoup.question: What is Trainsoup?
whatIsTrainsoup.answer: Trainsoup is an online platform for booking train tickets, finding train schedules, and getting information about train travel throughout the country. Our goal is to make train travel easier and more accessible for everyone.

contactCustomerService.question: How can I contact customer service?
contactCustomerService.answer: You can reach our customer support team by sending us an email at support@trainsoup.com. Our customer service is available Monday to Friday, from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.

mobileApp.question: Is there a Trainsoup mobile app?
mobileApp.answer: At the moment, there is no app for mobile devices yet.

createAccount.question: How do I create an account?
createAccount.answer: Click on the 'Login' button in the top right corner of the page, then select 'Create an account'. Enter your details including name, email, and password, and you're ready to go!

bookTicket.question: How do I book a ticket?
bookTicket.answer: You can book a ticket using the 'Find ticket' function on our homepage. Enter your departure and arrival stations, your desired date and time, and follow the instructions to complete the booking.

cancelTicket.question: Can I cancel my ticket?
cancelTicket.answer: Yes, tickets can be canceled up to 24 hours before departure. Go to your account, find the booking, and select 'Cancel ticket'.

receiveTicket.question: How do I receive my ticket?
receiveTicket.answer: After booking, your ticket will be available in electronic format in your account. You can choose to print it or show the electronic ticket on your mobile device.

discounts.question: Are discounts available?
discounts.answer: Yes, we offer various discounts for students, seniors, families, and frequent travelers. Check the 'Discounts' section when booking your ticket to see the available options.

arrivalTime.question: How early should I arrive at the station?
arrivalTime.answer: We recommend arriving at least 15-20 minutes before departure.

luggage.question: Can I bring luggage on the train?
luggage.answer: Yes, passengers can bring luggage on board. Most trains have overhead racks for smaller items and dedicated areas for larger luggage. There may be restrictions on size and quantity for some types of trains.

pets.question: Are pets allowed on trains?
pets.answer: Small pets in appropriate carriers are generally allowed on most trains. Larger dogs may require a ticket and a muzzle. Service animals are always allowed. Check the specific rules when booking.

delays.question: What happens if my train is delayed or canceled?
delays.answer: In case of delays or cancellations, you are entitled to compensation depending on the length of the delay and the reason.

wifi.question: Is there Wi-Fi on trains?
wifi.answer: Many of our high-speed and intercity trains offer free Wi-Fi. Availability is indicated when booking and on train information displays at stations.

food.question: Are food and drinks available on board?
food.answer: Long-distance and high-speed trains typically have a bar or restaurant car offering snacks, meals, and drinks. Some premium services include complimentary refreshments.

accessibility.question: Is there accessibility for passengers with reduced mobility?
accessibility.answer: Yes, we are committed to making train travel accessible to everyone. Most stations and modern trains have facilities for passengers with reduced mobility. You can request special assistance when booking.

powerOutlets.question: Are there power outlets on trains?
powerOutlets.answer: Most high-speed and long-distance trains are equipped with power outlets at the seats. This information is available when checking train details during booking.

introduction.title: Introduction
content: Welcome to TrainSoup's Privacy Policy. This policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service.

We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting personally identifiable information that may be collected through our website or app. We have adopted this privacy policy to explain what information may be collected, how we use this information, and under what circumstances we may disclose the information to third parties.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.subtitle: Personal Data
content: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide when using our service, including:
listItems: Name, email address, and contact information
Information shared through customer support channels

informationUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
content: We use the collected data for various purposes, including:
listItems: Managing your account and verifying your identity

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
content: We may share your personal information in the following situations:

listItems.title: With Service Providers:
listItems.description: We may share your information with third-party vendors who provide services on our behalf.

listItems.title: For Business Transfers:
listItems.description: We may share information in connection with a merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition.

listItems.title: With Your Consent:
listItems.description: We may disclose your personal information for any other purpose with your consent.

listItems.title: Legal Requirements:
listItems.description: We may disclose your information when required by law or to protect our rights.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
content: The security of your data is important to us. We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information, but no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to maintain the safety of your personal data.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:
listItems: The right to access information we have about you
The right to request correction of inaccurate information
The right to request deletion of your data
The right to restrict or object to processing
yourRights.additional: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided at the end of this policy.

cookiesAndTracking.title: Cookies and Tracking
content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information.
Cookies are files with a small amount of data that may include an anonymous unique identifier. They are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device.
You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our service.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
